tags.document:
<!doctype html>
<html>
<head>
<meta charset='UTF-8'>
<title>${title}</title>
<meta name='author' content='${author}'/>
<meta name='date' content='${date}'/>
<link rel='stylesheet' type='text/css' href='${template-path}/${class}.css'>
</head>
<body>
<header>${title}</header>
${content}</body>
</html>
tags.heading: <h${level}>${content}</h${level}>
